Package com.spectralogic.ds3client.helpers.strategy.transferstrategy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventDispatcher
    An interface to provide the ability to register for and emit events.
    Observer<T>
    An interface to allow for sending events.
    TransferMethod
    Define the contract used to put or get a blob.
    TransferRetryDecorator  
    TransferStrategy
    Define the contract for concrete classes that implement data movement.
    UpdateStrategy<T>
    This is a marker interface intended to allow for building different ways of emitting events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractObserver<T>
    An observer implementation that provides a default update method.
    BlobTransferredEventObserver
    This class provides the ability to emit an event when a blob transfer has completed.
    ChecksumEvent
    The event emitted when we have computed the checksum for a blob to be transferred to a Black Pearl.
    ChecksumObserver
    This class provides the ability to emit an event when we have computed the checksum value for a blob to be transferred to a Black Pearl.
    ContinueForeverTransferRetryDecorator
    A TransferRetryDecorator that will continue to retry a blob transfer, until the transfer either succeeds or experiences an unrecoverable exception.
    DataTransferredObserver  
    EventDispatcherImpl  
    FailureEventObserver
    This class provides the ability to emit an event when we have encountered an exception during a blob transfer.
    GetJobNetworkFailureRetryDecorator
    An implementation of TransferMethod that wraps another instance of TransferMethod to provide the ability to resume a get operation that transfers less data than is needed for a blob transfer to complete.
    GetJobPartialBlobTransferMethod
    When a blob transfer retrieves less data than is needed to compete the transfer, the GetJobNetworkFailureRetryDecorator that recognizes that situation will create an instance of this class.
    GetJobTransferMethod
    The HTTP GET implementation class that retrieves a blob from a Black Pearl.
    MaxNumObjectTransferAttemptsDecorator
    A TransferRetryDecorator that will continue to retry a blob transfer at most maxNumObjectTransferAttempts times, until the transfer either succeeds or experiences an unrecoverable exception.
    MetaDataReceivedObserver
    This class provides the ability to emit an event when we receive metadata during a get operation.
    MultiThreadedTransferStrategy
    An implementation of TransferStrategy that runs transfers in a multi-threaded executor.
    ObjectCompletedObserver
    An Observer that enables sending event when a DS3 object transfer completes.
    PutJobTransferMethod
    The HTTP PUT implementation class that retrieves a blob from a Black Pearl.
    SingleThreadedTransferStrategy
    An implementation of TransferStrategy that runs transfers in a single-threaded executor.
    TransferStrategyBuilder
    This class allows for building configurable behavior when putting objects to or getting objects from a Black Pearl.
    WaitingForChunksObserver
    This class emits an event when chunks we are creating or retrieving from a Black Pearl are not yet available.
